dmca.title: ThePlanetAbuse-C4136940C] [NTT-C3132534X] Urgent request: http://instant-av.co.uk/
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Thursday, May 17, 2007 3:26 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4136940C] [NTT-C3132534X] Urgent request: http://instant-av.co.uk/ ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Sat, 12 May 2007 16:50:39 +0100 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C794AD.49BF8A7D" Subject: Urgent request: http://instant-av.co.uk/ Date: Sat, 12 May 2007 16:50:27 +0100 Message-ID: X-MS-Has-Attach: X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: Urgent request: http://instant-av.co.uk/ Thread-Index: AceUrUKFWjkmv7StTluf1iaSJ2oLOg== From: "David Quinton" To: X-OriginalArrivalTime: 12 May 2007 15:50:39.0018 (UTC) FILETIME=[49B4B0A0:01C794AD] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Dear Sir/Madam Urgent: Re: http://instant-av.co.uk/ I work for the Trading Standards Department for the London Borough of Tower Hamlets. As part of our duties we enforce various consumer protection legislation in the UK. We have received reports of fraudulent activities involving the above website which advertises plasma TVs and laptops. Your network along with the ThePlanet.com appear to be the network operators for the site. I should be grateful therefore if you can suspend access to the internet for the website with immediate effect so that we can prevent further losses to consumers. If you could display a message on the website for consumers to contact Trading Standards on the above number then we should be able to advise them further. Please do not hesitate to contact me if you need further details. This message has also been faxed to your offices and we have also contacted Theplanet.com Many thanks for your assistance with this matter. Yours Sincerely, David Quinton Consumer Services Officer London Borough of Tower Hamlets Trading Standards Mulberry Place Po Box 55739 5 Clove Crescent London E14 1BY Tel: 0044 20 7364 6908 Fax: 0044 20 7364 6901 E-mail: david.quinton@towerhamlets.gov.uk ************************************************************************ ********* Working Together for a Better Tower Hamlets Web site : http://www.towerhamlets.gov.uk London Borough of Tower Hamlets E-Mail Disclaimer. This communication and any attachments are intended for the addressee only and may be confidential. It may contain privileged and confidential information and if you are not the intended recipient, you must not copy, distribute or take any action in reliance on it. If you have received this E-Mail in error please notify us as soon as possible and delete this E-Mail and any attachments. This message has been checked for viruses, however we cannot guarantee that this message or any attachment is virus free or has not been intercepted or amended. The information contained in this E-Mail may be subject to public disclosure under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. Unless the information is legally exempt from disclosure, the Confidentiality of this E-Mail and your reply cannot be guaranteed. ************************************************************************ ************ MIME element (text/html)
Dear Sir/Madam
 

Urgent:           & nbsp;   Re: http://instant-av.co.uk/ 

I work for the Trading Standards Department for the London Borough of Tower Hamlets. As part of our duties we enforce various consumer protection legislation in the UK. 

We have received reports of fraudulent activities involving the above website which advertises plasma TVs and laptops. Your network along with the ThePlanet.com appear to be the network operators for the site.

I should be grateful therefore if you can suspend access to the internet for the website with immediate effect so that we can prevent further losses to consumers. If you could display a message on the website for consumers to contact Trading Standards on the above number then we should be able to advise them further. 

Please do not hesitate to contact me if you need further details. This message has also been faxed to your offices and we have also contacted Theplanet.com

Many thanks for your assistance with this matter.

Yours Sincerely,

David Quinton
Consumer Services Officer
London Borough of Tower Hamlets
Trading Standards
Mulberry Place
Po Box 55739
5 Clove Crescent
London E14 1BY
 
Tel:  0044 20 7364 6908
Fax: 0044 20 7364 6901
E-mail: david.quinton@towerhamlets.gov.uk
 

***************************** ****************************************************

Working Together for a Better Tower Hamlets

Web site : http://www.towerhamlets.gov.uk

 

London Borough of Tower Hamlets E-Mail Disclaimer.

 

This communication and any attachments are intended for the addressee only and may be confidential. It may contain privileged and confidential information and if you are not the intended recipient, you must not copy, distribute or take any action in reliance on it. If you have received this E-Mail in error please notify us as soon as possible and delete this E-Mail and any attachments. This message has been checked for viruses, however we cannot guarantee that this message or any attachment is virus free or has not been intercepted or amended. The information contained in this E-Mail may be subject to public disclosure under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. Unless the information is legally exempt from disclosure, the Confidentiality of this E-Mail and your reply cannot be guaranteed.
